DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Magma Power Gets Inquiries : After rejecting a revised bid by California Energy Co. , San Diego-based Magma Power Co . has gotten a " substantial number of inquiries " since announcing it would meet with interested parties to discuss possible business combinations , its chief_executive said . In rejecting Omaha-based California Energy ' s offer for a 51 % stake in the company and a revised bid of $ 38.50 per share_in cash and stock , Magma said it wanted to study alternatives benefiting shareholder value , including joint_ventures , a merger or some_other combination . Chief_Executive Ralph Boeker declined to identify the interested parties .
